LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonBW.label: porcelain loong
LanguageData.NY_ForgingDragonBW.description:
A subspecies of loong, the porcelain loongs are characterized by their blue tails, horns and eyes, as well as their snow white skin. They lacked physical durability but excel at crafts. Procelains are known for famous craftloongs, though the unskilled ones still have to fight for a living.

The myths say they was once purebloods, and their current form was the result of praying for extraordinary abilities, at the price of fragility.

The smelt loong, or loong for short, is a humanoid xenotype bearing the name of a legendary creature, once created an imperial culture and advanced metallurgy in a distant world. Only female loongs exist, making them dependent on males of other xenotypes to reproduce.
